name: Flappy Bird but in Browser
description:
OVERVIEW

Flappy Bird is the most popular arcade mobile game from 2014 and was developed by Dong Nguyen and published by .GEARS Studios. This game was considered as one of the most addictive casual game in mobile history and therefore was removed from the Play Store and the App Store due to its addictiveness. The game is a side-scroller where the player controls a bird, attempting to fly between columns of green pipes without hitting them.

FEATURES

  • Responsive Design (Mobile-Friendly)
  • Most-Accurate Replica of the Original Flappy Bird
  • Local Saving for High Scores
  • Pause and Mute Buttons (Which is missing in the original game)

DISCLAIMER

This game is obviously a clone and was recreated from scratch. The game assets I used belongs to the respective owner. I made this for the purpose of learning, not to earn money and also boredom has forced me to recreate this using Javascript.

BUGS & SUGGESTIONS

I developed this game using only my phone so I haven't actually tested it yet in a desktop browser (I unfortunately don't have anything except my phone) so if there is a noticeable bug feel free to comment and if you have any suggestions that will be cool to know too. Thanks for playing!

TO-DO LIST

If everything goes well or if anyone is interested to see more, here's what I'm planning;

  • Evolutionary AI plays Flappy Bird using Neural Network and Genetic Algorithm
  • Medals (yep its not been added yet :<)
  • Ability to customized every possible thing inside the game such as bird's fly lift, pipe's positioning and gap length, horizontal speed etc.
  • Multiplayer (?)
